humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the patient has 'pN1a (2/25)', which means that out of 25 assessed lymph nodes, 2 were found to have metastases. This corresponds to N1 according to the AJCC staging system and the rules provided.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pN' component of the tumor classification in the pathology report indicates the pathologic N stage of the cancer. In this report, the 'pN1a (2/25)' indicates that 2 out of 25 sampled lymph nodes contained metastases. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.
